Otro de los integrantes es Dina mujer de 29 años su negocio es la venta de perecederos y Soledad mujer de 51 años su negocio es la venta de verduras.
texts.en:
This group is comprised of three determined workers.  Oscar, 32, has a common-law wife and he grows crops which he sells at the local market.  He wants to plant  chili peppers, yucca plant, banana and tomato.  He also wants to buy fertilizer, hire a worker and pay for transportation.

The other members of the group are Dina, 29, who sells agricultural produce and Soledad, 51, who sells vegetables.

loans.use: To plant crops, buy fertilizer and hire a worker and transportation.

loans.name: Nicaraguita Group

texts.es: El grupo lo conforman tres socios de negocio uno de ellos es Meyling tiene la edad de 21 años, casada, con dos hijos, su negocio es la venta de cosméticos desde hace 6 meses en su comunidad, el crédito lo está solicitando para la compra de perfumes, lociones, cremas, pinturas, labiales, maquillaje, shampoo. Alexandra mujer de 36 años su negocio es la venta de ropa y Isidro tiene la edad de 46 años su negocio es la venta de molduras y marcos.
texts.en:
This group consists of three members. One of them is Meyling. She is 21 years old, married and has two children. She has made a living selling cosmetics for the last 6 months in her community. She is requesting this loan in order to buy perfumes, lotions, creams, make-up, lip balms and shampoo.

The other members are Alexandra, who is 36 years old and makes a living selling clothes and Isidro, who is 46 years old and makes a living selling moulds and frames.

loans.use: to buy perfumes, lotions, creams, make-up, lip balms and shampoo.

loans.name: La Estrella Y El Lucero Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por tres socias microempresarias exitosas una de ellas es Mariela tiene la edad de 24 años, acompañada, con un hijo menor bajo su cargo,  su negocio es la venta de ropa usada y calzado desde hace 3 años y medio. El crédito lo está solicitando para la compra de mercadería como pantalones, blusas, ropa de niños, camisetas, calzado de niños. Tania tiene 27 años su negocio es la venta de sopa y Erika tiene 25 años su negocio es la venta de cosmeticos, ropa nueva y usada.
texts.en:
This group consists of three successful entrepreneurial members. One of them is Mariela. She is 24 years old and has a partner and one child under her care. She has made a living selling used clothes and footwear for the past three and a half years. She is requesting this loan in order to buy clothing merchandise such as trousers, blouses, children's clothes, shirts and children's footwear.

The other members are Tania, who is 27 years old and makes a living selling soup and Erika, who is 25 years old and makes a living selling cosmetics and both new and used clothes.

loans.use: to buy clothing merchandise such as trousers, blouses, children's clothes, shirts and children's footwear.

loans.name: Satenik

texts.en: Satenik is an experienced farmer from Horom village in the Shirak region. She lives with her husband and two sons. To take care of her family, Satenik is engaged in cattle breeding, aviculture, beekeeping, and cultivation of wheat and potatoes. Her husband and sons assist her greatly in her daily activities related to farming; they sell the agricultural products in the local market, which is the family's main source of income. To continue her agribusiness in a sustainable way, Satenik needs a loan of 3,000 USD to purchase fertilizers and potato seeds. The loan will help her run her agribusiness in a productive way. Satenik and her family rely on the goodwill of lenders and appreciate their support in collecting the requested loan to sustain and develop their agribusiness.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and potato seeds

loans.name: Hovhannes

texts.en:
Hovhannes is a young farmer from Norakert village of Armavir region. He lives with his wife, 11-year-old daughter, and his parents. He and his father are employed in the government sector and are the main breadwinners of the family. Their salaries, however, are not enough to effectively cover the family's needs. Hovhannes is also engaged in breeding livestock of a cow and pigs, in aviculture, in viniculture and in cultivation of alfalfa. With the help of his family members Hovhannes sells the agricultural products in the local market, which is the main source of the family's income. 

To be able to continue his agribusiness in a sustainable way Hovhannes needs a loan of USD 1,500 to purchase a cow, to buy some forage for the livestock and to purchase fertilizer. Hovhannes and his family rely on the good will of the lenders and will appreciate their support in collecting the needed loan to sustain their agribusiness.

loans.use: to purchase a cow, to buy some forage for the livestock and to purchase fertilizer.

loans.name: Araksi

texts.en:
Araksi is an experienced agronomist from Shamb village of the Syunik region. She lives with her husband and three school-aged children (two sons and a daughter). Her husband works in the private sector and is the main breadwinner of the family. To assist her husband in earning a living for the family, Araksi is engaged in cattle breeding, breeding a livestock of sheep, and cultivating wheat, cabbage, potatoes, apples, pears, and walnuts. She sells the products in the local market, which is an important source of the family’s income. 

To continue running her agribusiness in a sustainable way, Araksi needs a loan of 3,000 USD to purchase fuel, to buy cellophane for greenhouse construction, and to renovate the greenhouse. She and her family highly rely on the goodwill of the lenders and will appreciate their support in collecting the needed amount to maintain and develop their agribusiness.

loans.use: to purchase fuel, to buy cellophane for greenhouse construction, and to renovate the greenhouse

loans.name: Maranata Group

texts.es: El grupo lo forman tres socios emprendedores y luchadores uno de ellos es Blanca tiene 28 años, acompañada, su negocio es la venta de frutas en el tiangue  de su comunidad  desde hace 8 años, ella solicita crédito para invertir en un nuevo negocio como es la compra de especies como es achote, canela, clavo de olor, salsa inglesa, algodón, manzanilla, pimienta, anelina, azulillo, romero, otros. Hipólita tiene 57 años su negocio es la venta de frutas desde hace 15  años, Erick tiene 23 años su negocio es la venta de bolsos desde hace 4 años.
texts.en:
This group is comprised of three determined entrepreneurs, one of whom is Blanca.  She is 28 years old, has a common-law husband and sells fruits at the small market in her community.  She has been in business for eight years and is requesting a new loan to buy spices such as annatto, cinnamon, clove, camomille, pepper, rosemary, etc.

Hipólita, 57, has been selling fruits for 15 years.  Erick, 23, has been selling bags for four years.

loans.use: To buy spices such as annatto, cinnamon, clove,camomille, pepper, rosemary, etc.

loans.name: El Espino Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por tres socias exitosas una de ellas es Doña Vilma tiene la edad de 56 años, casada, su negocio es la venta de comida desde hace 6 años. Tiene de ser cliente de la institución 6 años. Lo que ha demostrado ser una persona muy responsable en sus cuotas. Requiere nuevamente un crédito para invertir en la compra de cosecha de tamarindo. Isamar tiene 20 años su negocio es la elaboración de sartenes y Silvia tiene 24 años su negocio es la venta de tortillas.
texts.en:
This group consists of three successful members. One of them is Vilma. She is 56 years old and she is married. She has made a living selling food for the past 6 years. She has been a client of this MFI for the last 6 years, during which she has shown herself to be very responsible in her monthly payments. She is once more requesting a loan in order to invest in buying tamarind harvest.

The other members of the group are Isamar, who is 20 years old and makes a living making pans and Silvia, who is 24 years old and makes a living selling tortillas.

loans.use: to invest in buying tamarind harvest

loans.name: Katya

texts.en:
Katya is a farmer from Akner village of Syuniq region. She lives with her husband and 10-year-old son. Katya's husband has migrated to Russia as a labor migrant; he works there and sends money to the family to take care of their needs. 

To take care of her family's needs Katya is engaged in an agribusiness. She breeds cattle, and sells the agricultural products in the local market. As life is getting more expensive day-by-day Katya needs to expand her agribusiness a little bit to be able to make ends meet. She currently needs a loan of USD 3,000 to purchase three cows. 

Katya and her family rely on the good-will of lenders and will be very grateful to them for helping them collect the needed loan to sustain their agribusiness.

loans.use: to purchase three cows.

loans.name: Artem

texts.en:
Artem is a farmer from Akner village of Syuniq region. He lives with his wife and four children (two school age daughters – 10 and 9 years old, and two little sons – 6 and 4 years old). For more than seven years, Artem has been extensively engaged in an agribusiness. He is involved in cattle-breeding and sells the agricultural products in the local market. Artem's wife assists him in his daily activities related to farming. The agribusiness is the main source of income for the family. 

To be able to effectively meet the increasing needs of his big family, Artem wants to expand his agribusiness a little bit. He needs a loan of USD 3,000 to purchase three cows. Artem and his family highly rely on the good-will of the lenders and will be thankful to them for their help in collecting the needed loan.

loans.use: to purchase three cows.

loans.name: Gevorg

texts.en: Gevorg is a young farmer from Gogaran village, in the Lori region of Armenia. He lives with his wife, 8-year-old daughter and 5-year-old son. To take care of his family Gevorg is extensively engaged in agribusiness. He is involved in cattle, sheep and pig breeding, in aviculture, and in the cultivation of wheat, potatoes, and alfalfa. He sells the agricultural products at the local market, which is the main source of the family's income. Gevorg's wife assists him in his daily activities related to farming. To sustain his agribusiness Gevorg needs to make some investments. He needs a loan of $3,000 to purchase five calves, to buy some forage for the cattle, and to pay for harvesting services. Gevorg and his family rely on the good will of the lenders and will greatly appreciate their support in fulfilling the needed loan.

loans.use: to purchase five calves, to buy some forage for his cattle, and to pay for harvesting services.

loans.name: Progresando Juntos Group

texts.es: Este grupo lo conforma cuatro socias emprendedoras una de ellas es Karla tiene 24 años de edad, soltera, con dos hijos que dependen de ella, su negocio es la venta de gallina desde hace 2 año. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de gallinas para posteriormente venderlas. Juana tiene 25 años su negocio es la venta de yoltamales y tortillas, Rosa mujer de 65 años su negocio es la venta de tamales, Lucrecia de 49 años de edad su negocio es la venta de productos varios.
texts.en:
This group is made up of four enterprising members, one of whom is Karla, 24. She is single and has two dependent children. She has had a business selling chickens for two years. 

She needs this loan to buy chickens which she will later sell. 

Juana, 25, sells corn tamales and tortillas. Rosa, 65, sells tamales. Lucrecia, 49, sells various products.

loans.use: to buy chickens which she will later sell.

loans.name: Miguel

texts.es: Miguel, de 57 años, esta casado y sus hijos ya son independientes. Vive en su casa propia al lado de esposa, su hermana y sus dos sobrinos. El trabajo de Miguel  consiste en la venta de bebidas gaseosas, cervezas, jugos envasados y agua mineral de distintas marcas. Todos los lunes realiza su pedido a las distribuidoras con las que trabaja, las mismas que le entregan los productos solicitados en su mismo domicilio, además de vender bebidas también vende hielo y chupetes de frutas regionales, trabaja en esta actividad por más de 04 años y con la ayuda de su hermana complementa su labor con la venta de pollo asado los fines de semana ya que ha visto en este negocio la oportunidad perfecta de vender mayor cantidad de bebidas. En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 1500, está agradecida y contenta al saber que sigue contando con el apoyo financiero que necesita para avanzar con el progreso de su negocio. Con el monto solicitado comprará mayor cantidad de bebidas tanto gaseosas, cervezas, jugos envasados y agua mineral.
texts.en: Miguel is 57 years old, married and his children are now independent adults. Miguel lives in a house, which he owns, with his wife, sister and two nephews. Miguel's work consists of selling different brands of fizzy drinks, beers, bottled juices and mineral water. Every Monday he orders stock from distributors, who deliver the products direct to his home. In addition to selling drinks, Miguel sells ice and fruit-flavoured ice-lollies. Miguel has been doing this work for over four years and, with the help of his sister, he also sells roast chicken at the weekend. He does this as he noticed it was the perfect way to sell his drinks in higher quantities. On this occasion Miguel is applying for a loan of 1500 Nuevo Soles. He is grateful and happy to know that he can continue to rely on the financial support that he needs to progress with his business. Miguel will use this loan to buy larger quantities of drinks, including fizzy drinks, beer, bottled juices and mineral water.

loans.use: to buy drinks in bulk.

loans.name: Vardan

texts.en:
Vardan is a farmer from Noyakert village of Ararat region. He lives with his wife, and two school age sons (8 and 6 years old). Vardan is employed in the private sector and is the main breadwinner of the family. His salary, however, is not enough to provide a living. 

For more than ten years, Vardan has been engaged in an agribusiness to be able to meet his family's needs. With the help of his wife he is involved in cattle breeding, in breeding hens, and in cultivation of wheat and onions. He sells the agricultural products in the local market, and this is the main source of income for the family. 

To sustain his agribusiness, Vardan currently needs a loan of USD 3,000 to purchase forage for cattle, and to pay for harvesting services. Vardan and his family rely on the good will of the lenders and will be very thankful to them for their help in collecting the needed loan to maintain and develop their agribusiness.

loans.use: to purchase forage for cattle, and to pay for harvesting services.

loans.name: Las Marias Group

texts.es: Flor es una de las tres integrantes del grupo tiene la edad de 24 años, soltera, su negocio es la venta de derivados del maíz como pinol, pinolillo desde hace 10 años. Tiene de ser cliente de la institución 1 año. El crédito lo solicita nuevamente para la compra de quintal de maíz, leña, frambuesa, vainilla,canela, cacao  transporte. Ana mujer de 56 años su negocio es la venta de perecederos, María tiene 39 años su negocio es la venta de pinol y pinolillo.
texts.en:
Flor is one of the three members of this group. She is 24 years old and single. She has had a business selling corn products such as pinol and pinolillo (traditional drinks made of corn and cacao) for ten years. She has been a client of the institution for one year. She has applied for a loan to buy corn, firewood, raspberries, vanilla, cinnamon, and cacao and to pay for transport. 

Ana, 56, has a business selling perishable goods. María, 39, has a business selling pinol and pinolillo.

loans.use: to buy materials such as corn, firewood, raspberries, vanilla, cinnamon, cocoa, etc and to pay for transport costs.

loans.name: Meliqset

texts.en: Meliqset is a young farmer from the Nor Vedi village in the Ararat region. He lives with his wife, three little sons, and his elderly pensioner father. To take care of his family he has engaged in cattle breeding, in viniculture, and in cultivation of corn, watermelon, tomatoes, apricots, and apples for the last 13 years. He sells the agricultural products at the local market, which is the main source of family's income. As their life is getting more expensive day by day Maliqset wants to expand his agribusiness to be able to meet their daily needs. A loan of $2,500 will be a huge support to this young hard-working man and his family and will enable him to purchase two steers and to buy some forage for his cattle. Meliqset and his family rely on the good will of the lenders and will appreciate their support in collecting the needed loan to maintain and develop their agribusiness.

loans.use: to purchase two steers and to buy some forage for his cattle.

loans.name: Armine

texts.en: Armine is an agronomist from the Geghakert village in the Armavir region. She lives with her husband, twin 2-year-old sons, and her 4-year-old daughter. To be able to meet her family's needs Armine is engaged in the cultivation of flowers and strawberries. With the help of her husband she sells the agricultural products in the local market, which is the main source of the family's income. Armine and her family have a greenhouse, where they grow flowers. As the family's needs are increasing with time Armine wants to expand her agribusiness to be able to meet their ends. She needs a loan of $1,500 to purchase the necessary materials (cellophane and bottles) for building a new greenhouse. Armine and her family rely on the good will of the lenders and will highly appreciate their support in collecting the loan to maintain and develop their agribusiness.

loans.use: to purchase the necessary materials (cellophane and bottles) for building a new greenhouse.

loans.name: Meri

texts.en:
Meri is a young private entrepreneur from Voskehat village of Armavir region. She lives with her parents and sister. She is the main breadwinner of her family. To take care of her family's daily needs Meri runs a small local clothes boutique. She also has a photocopying machine in her boutique. The assortment of goods she sells is not that large and needs to be expanded and updated periodically in order for her small business to function in an effective and productive way. 

Meri currently needs a loan of USD 1,500 to purchase new items to resell in her boutique. The loan will make her small business become competitive. Meri and her family rely on the good will of the lenders and will highly appreciate their support in collecting the needed loan to develop her small business.

loans.use: to purchase new items to resell in her boutique.

loans.name: Adelaida

texts.en: Adelaida is a devoted mother from Panik village. She lives with her husband and three children (two boys and a girl). Together with her husband, Adelaida is involved in agribusiness. They own a plot of land where wheat, greens, and pear trees are cultivated. Adelaida's farm isn't very big. She also owns a pigs and piglets. Because Adelaida’s farm needs a lot of improvements Adelaida has applied for this loan. She is asking for a loan of $3000 to be able to purchase corn, wheat and barley seeds to allow her to enlarge the cultivation process. The loan is very important for this hardworking woman who does her best to ensure better living conditions for her family.

loans.use: to pay for corn, wheat and barley seeds for cultivation.

loans.name: Fe Y Esperanza Group

texts.es: Grupo conformado por tres socias trabajadoras una de ellas es Marisol  mujer de 47 años, acompañada, su negocio es la elaboración y venta de nacatamales  desde hace 6 años, su compañero le ayuda a vender los nacatamales. Tiene 5 años de ser cliente de la institución. El crédito  lo está solicitando para la compra de materia prima como maíz, leña, carne de cerdo, hojas de chagüites, papa, arroz, chile, sal, chiltoma, cebolla, tomate, ajo, achote. Lucia mujer de 43 años su negocio es dar a trabajar un taxi, Bertha mujer de  48 años su negocio es una pulpería.
texts.en:
This group is composed of three hardworking members. One of them is Marisol, who is 47 years old and in a relationship. She runs a business making and selling nacatamales [a traditional dish similar to tamales]. She has been doing this for six years and her partner helps her to sell them.

Marisol has been a client of this institution for five years. She is requesting a loan to buy ingredients such as corn, firewood, pork, chagüite [banana leaves], potatoes, rice, chili, salt, chiltoma [sweet pepper], onions, tomatoes, garlic and achiote [a distinctly colored and flavored mainstay of Central American food].

Lucia, 43, owns a taxi and pays someone to drive it; and Bertha, 48, owns a grocery store.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to make food, such as corn, pork, potatoes, rice and chili.

loans.name: Garik

texts.en:
Garik is from Jojkan village, in the Lori region. He has been engaged in agriculture for 20 years. Specifically, Garik keeps chickens and cultivates wheat and barley. Garik also owns an orchard where different types of trees are grown (plum, cherry, grape, nut, etc.)
His father is a migrant worker who tries hard to sustain his family financially. Now, because of hard times, Garik needs support. He is asking for this loan to be able to purchase wheat and barley seeds and pay for cultivation work. As his father isn't with him, it is very difficult for Garik to gather the harvest alone and this is the reason he needs help.
The loan of $2,500 will greatly assist Garik and he will be very thankful to lenders for the support.

loans.use: to pay for wheat and barley seeds and pay for cultivation work.

loans.name: Anush

texts.en:
Anush lives in Bazum village of Armenia’s Lori region. Anush is a mother of two sons. Her elder son is married and lives together with Anush, and Anush's younger son serves in the army.
Anush has been engaged in agribusiness for seven years. Together with her husband, they keep cows and chickens and cultivate potatoes and grass. The gathered harvest is sold in local open markets and the family is able to cover its daily needs.
Now, by applying for this loan, Anush is asking for financial support. Because of hard financial conditions, Anush and her husband aren't able to purchase forage and feed the livestock.
The loan of $3000 will help Anush to purchase forage for feeding the livestock and also make critical credit repayments.
The help of lenders is very important for Anush and she will be very grateful for the support.

loans.use: to pay for forage for feeding the livestock and make credit repayments.

loans.name: Anyuta

texts.en: Anyuta is an experienced farmer from the Araqs village in the Armavir region. She lives with her husband, 9-year-old daughter and 4-year-old son. To take care of her family Anyuta is engaged in cultivating potatoes, greens, tomatoes and peppers. With the help of her husband Anyuta sells the agricultural products at the local market, which is the main source of the family's income. As the family's needs are increasing day by day, and their life is getting even more expensive Anyuta wants to expand her agribusiness in order to more effectively meet the family's needs. A loan of $2,000 will be a huge help to this hard-working woman and her family enabling her to purchase materials (cellophane and pipes) for greenhouse construction and to buy fertilizers. Anyuta and her family rely on the good will of the lenders and will be thankful to them for their support in collecting the needed amount of this loan.

loans.use: to purchase materials (cellophane and pipes) for greenhouse construction and to buy fertilizers.

loans.name: Arlin Del Socorro

texts.es: Arlin mujer emprendedora y luchadora de 32 años de edad, acompañada, con tres hijos, su negocio es la venta de ropa en su comunidad de Diria y alrededores, desde hace 3 años, lleva siendo cliente de la institución 2 años tiempo en el cual ha demostrado ser una persona muy responsable en sus cuotas. Solicita nuevamente crédito para la compra de mercadería como trajes de niños, pantalones de hombre pantalones de mujer, licras, pantalones para niños, blusas, etc.
texts.en: Arlin is a plucky and enterprising woman. She is 32 year old and has a partner and three children. She has a business selling clothes in her local community - Diria - and in the surrounding area. Arlin has had the business for three years and has been a customer with the communal bank for two years, during which time she proven herself to be very responsible with her repayments. Arlin is applying for a new loan in order to buy merchandise, such as children's clothes, men's and women's trousers, Lycra trousers for children, blouses, and more.

loans.use: to buy children's clothes, men's and women's trousers, Lycra trousers for children, blouses, and more.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy flagstones to pave his house.

loans.name: Danilo Edilberto

texts.es:
Danilo tiene 29 años de edad vive en Union Libre tiene un hijo vive con la compañera y con el hijo en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia Los Ríos.

Es integrante de ventanilla V.R.C.  Virgen de Guadalupe que se encuentra ubicada en la Parroquia Puerto  Pechiche perteneciente al Cantón Pueblo Viejo esta ventanilla se dedica  a  labores agropecuarias.

Danilo se dedica a la siembra de maíz y arroz. Solicita el préstamo para la comprar de abonos organicos e inorganicos, semillas, abonos e insecticidad.

Las compras lo realiza en el cantón ventanas cada 15 dias. La meta es mejorar la siembra para tener mas ingresos.


El desafío que enfrenta son las plagas y enfermedades como la langosta. En los tiempos libres le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Danilo is 29 years old and has a partner and one son. The family lives together in the Ventanas canton in Los Ríos province.

Danilo is a member of the "Virgen de Guadalupe" communal bank in the Puerto Pechiche parish of the Pueblo Viejo area. The members of this communal bank work in agriculture and raising livestock.

Danil makes a living sowing corn and rice. He is applying for this loan in order to buy organic and inorganic manure, seeds and insecticide.

Danilo buys his supplies in the Ventanas canton every fortnight. His goal is to improve his crops in order to have a higher income.

The challenge that Danilo is facing is dealing with diseases which affect the crops. In his free time, Danilo likes to play sports.

loans.use: to buy organic and inorganic manure, seeds and insecticides.

loans.name: Alejandro Antonio

texts.es:
Alejandro tiene 23 años de edad estado civil unión libre vive con la esposa y su hija en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.

Es integrante de la VRC SAN FRANCISCO, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Pantano, pertenece al Cantón Ventanas se dedican a labores Agrícolas y Pecuarias.

Alejandro se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz. Solicita el crédito para comprar insecticidas, urea, fertilizantes. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar lo necesario para las siembras. Las compras las realiza en Ventanas.
El sueño es terminar la casa. Los desafíos a los que se enfrentan son las plagas y la competencia. En su tiempo libre le gusta pasar con la familia.
texts.en:
Alejandro is 23 years old and is married. He lives with his wife and daughter in the Ventanas canton of the Los Ríos province. 

Alejandro is a member of the "San Francisco" communal bank, in the Pantano area of the Ventanas canton. Here the people make a living in agriculture and raising livestock.

Alejandro works in agriculture - he sows corn. He is applying for this loan in order to buy insecticides, urea and fertilisers. With the help of this loan he will buy able to buy the necessary supplies for sowing his crops. Alejandro will make his purchases in Ventanas.

Alejandro's dream is to finish building his house. One challenge that he is facing at work is diseases affecting the crops and competition from other businesses. Alejandro likes to spend his free time with his family.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies to sow corn.

loans.name: Anna

texts.en:
Anna is an agronomist from Arevshat village of Shirak region. She lives with her husband, two daughters (9 and 3 years old), 7 year-old-son, and her elderly pensioner mother-in-law. To take care of her family Anna is engaged in cattle breeding, and in cultivation of wheat, potatoes, carrots, garlic, and beets. With the help of her family members she sells the agricultural products in the local market. This is the main source of income for the family. 

To continue running her agribusiness in a sustainable way, Anna currently needs to make some investments. She needs a loan of USD 2,000 to rent a piece of land, to purchase two calves and to make previous credit repayments. 

Anna and her family rely on the good will of the lenders and will greatly appreciate their support in collecting the needed loan to sustain their agribusiness.

loans.use: to rent a piece of land, to purchase two calves and to make previous credit repayments.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad is a 43-year-old married man from Gaza city. He lives with his wife and seven kids in a simple house in the city. He works as an employee in a local firm, getting a very low income. This is the only source of income to the family. Ahmad had a problem with his hand. He had an accident and he had to have urgent surgery on his wrist bone.

He took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to pay the hospital expenses for doing the surgery for his hand. By taking this loan, Ahmad will be able to get back to work and do his daily activities. 

Ahmad appears in the photo

loans.use: to pay the hospital expenses for doing surgery on his hand.

loans.name: Karapet

texts.en:
Karapet is an experienced farmer from Karmravan village of Shirak region. He lives with his wife, two daughters, and his son. Karapet's eldest daughter works in the village local school as a teacher. Her salary, however, is very low, and she cannot afford a living based on that salary alone.

Karapet and his family members are extensively engaged in an agribusiness. They are involved in cattle breeding, in aviculture, in breeding sheep, and in cultivation of alfalfa and grass. They sell the agricultural products in the local market, which is the main source of income for the family. Karapet currently needs a loan of USD 3,000 to purchase some forage for the livestock and to make previous credit repayments. 

He and his family rely on the good will of the lenders and will highly appreciate their support in collecting the needed loan to sustain their agribusiness.

loans.use: to purchase some forage for the livestock and to make previous credit repayments.

loans.name: Hrachya

texts.en:
Hrachya is an experienced farmer from Gandzaqar village of Tavush region. He lives with his wife, two sons (15 and 11 years old), and his two-year-old daughter. With the help of his wife, Hrachya is extensively engaged in an agribusiness. They are involved in cattle breeding, in aviculture, in breeding pigs and piglets, and in cultivation of corn and grass. Hrachya sells the agricultural products in the local market, which is the main source of income for the family. 

In order to organize his agribusiness in a more efficient and productive way, Hrachya needs a loan of USD 3,000 to purchase agricultural machinery. The latter will make the family’s daily activities related to farming more easy and effective. Hrachya and his family rely on the good will of the lenders and greatly appreciate their support in collecting the needed amount of loan to sustain their agribusiness.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural machinery.

loans.name: Ayman

texts.en:
Ayman is 24 years old. He works in a shoe shop, earning about $600 monthly. He lives with his family in Talfit, which is a Palestinian village in the Nablus Governorate in the northern West Bank, located 21 kilometers southeast of Nablus. According to the Palestinian Central Bureau of Statistics census, it had a population of 2,824 in 2007.

Ayman asked Ryada for this loan in order to paint his house and repair the walls. That will reflect better living conditions. He doesn’t have enough money to pay these expenses, so he is very grateful to everyone who helps him.

loans.use: to paint his house and repair the walls.

loans.name: Salim

texts.en:
Salim is a 21-year-old man who lives in Hodeida, Yemen. For the past two years he has been driving a bus, which has been a profitable business. It is the main source of income for the family, but he also needs more support to cover the costs from time to time. 

He is requesting a loan of 110,000 YER from AMB to help him cover the costs of purchasing necessary spare parts for his bus. This will increase the capacity to work extra hours and enable Salim to improve his family's income.

loans.use: to help him cover the costs of purchasing necessary spare parts for his bus.

loans.name: Omer

texts.en:
Omer is very trustworthy, responsible, and a hard worker. He is 33 years old and lives in Taiz, Yemen. He has been operating a business of shoe sales for over eight years. He collected money to open his business. He works very hard to improve the future for his family, and he is always looking for ways to provide new and better services to his customers. 

He requested a loan of 100,000 YER from AMB, which he will use to buy shoes to expand his enterprise so that he can provide his customers with a wider selection and better quality products. In the future, Omer hopes to have big clothing sales to increase his profit and improve his living conditions.

loans.use: to buy shoes to expand his enterprise so that he can provide his customers with a wider selection and better quality products.

loans.name: Eftekar

texts.en:
Eftekar is 45 years old and lives with her husband and her three children, two of whom attend the public primary school in Nablus. They live in Al-Lubban ash-Sharqiya, which is a Palestinian village in the northern West Bank, located 20 kilometers south of Nablus, in the Nablus Governorate. The town has a total land area of 12,075 dunams of which 200 dunams is built up. Her husband is an employee in the public sector which pays a low salary, so Eftekar is working as a farmer at a yard in her town to increase the family's income. 

Eftekar is asking Ryada for this loan to paint her house and put in doors and windows, which will help to warm her house, especially now in the winter. She is very grateful to everyone who helps her. Her husband is the man who appears beside her in the picture.

loans.use: to paint her house and put in doors and windows.

loans.name: Abu Bakr

texts.en:
Abu Bakr is a 30-year-old man living in Taiz, Yemen. He is a hardworking and very honorable man, always committed to getting ahead. All his life, he has been working hard and earning money to assist his family. He is a driver who earns a low income. He has financial problems because his income is not enough to cover his family's expenses.

He is applying for a loan of 200,000 YER from AMB in order to buy furniture and home appliances. He plans to open a retail store to make sure that his income is good enough to cover his and his family's expenses.

loans.use: to buy furniture and home appliances.

loans.name: Intesar

texts.en:
Intesar is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her husband appears in the photo.

Intesar is a 42-year-old married woman from Rafah city. She lives with her husband and kids in a humble house. For the past twelve years, her husband has been working as a farmer on their land. He plants seasonal fruits and vegetables, using greenhouses to get high quality crops. 

She and her husband would like to develop their farm and expand it. She requested a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help her to buy raw materials to build new greenhouses on their farm. By taking this loan, Intesar and her husband can expand the farm and the productivity will increase.

loans.use: to buy raw materials to build new greenhouses on their farm.

loans.name: Ayman

texts.en:
Ayman is a 27-year-old single young man from Rafah city. He lives with his family in a simple house in the city. He opened a small store for selling and repairing TV satellites and receivers. It is a good business and earns a good income.

He would like to improve his business and expand his store so he took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy more products and repair parts for his store. By taking this loan, Ayman will increase his productivity and sales and his income will also be increased. 

Ayman appears in the photo in his store.

loans.use: to buy more products and repair parts for his store.

loans.name: Aisa

texts.en:
This is Aisa, 21, a resident of Taiz, Yemen.  He manages his own household while operating the business. At this time, he is working hard to continually provide income for his everyday expenses. He has operated a grocery store for five years. He has been able to expand his business and his regular customers are his neighbors and the local community. 

To help him continue operations of his business, he is requesting a loan of 200,000 YER from AMB to buy grocery items for his business. This loan will enable him to expand his product inventory. He expects a boost in his business income. His dream for his business is to have a stable and profitable business. He is grateful for the opportunity that is being provided with this loan.

loans.use: to buy grocery items for his business.

loans.name: Maryam

texts.en:
Maryam is a conservative person who prefer not to have her photo published online, so her son appears in the photo.

Maryam is a 58-year-old married woman from Jabalia city. She is a mother of one son and five daughters.

Maryam's son works as a carpenter in a workshop he owns. He has been working in it for the past five years. It is a good business and he produces a lot of wood furniture with a very good quality.
 
Maryam took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help her son to buy more raw materials for his carpentry shop. By taking this loan, Maryam's son will be able to increase his productivity and also his income will be increased.

loans.use: to help her son buy more raw materials for his carpentry shop

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is a 37-year-old married man from Gaza city. He lives with his wife and three kids, two sons and one daughter, in a simple house in the city. He works as an employee in the public sector where he gets a low income. This is the only source of income for the family. 

He had a problem in his stomach for which he needed surgery. He took a USD loan from FATEN to help him pay the hospital expenses for the surgery on his stomach. By taking this loan, Mohammad will be able to get back to work and do his daily tasks.

Mohammad appears in the photo.

loans.use: to pay the hospital expenses for surgery on his stomach.

loans.name: Qosay Group

texts.en:
Qosay is a group which consists of three ladies who live in Hodeida, Yemen. They have asked for a loan in the amount of 120,000 YER. Sameera, 36 years old, is a married woman who is responsible for five children. She is the leader of this group asking for this loan. She works hard to assist her husband in providing for the family. 

She has been operating a business of selling incense, cosmetic materials and perfumes. Her income is used to provide for her family.  Any shortages of her product items will cause her job to stop. That is why she has applied for a loan to buy the required incense, cosmetic materials and perfumes to continue her business. All members of the group are hoping to earn a good income, which will allow them to improve their families' quality of life. 

They are grateful to Kiva lenders for financing their first loan.

loans.use: to buy incense, cosmetics and perfume to resell.

loans.name: Iman

texts.en:
Iman is a 51-year-old married woman from a small village near Jenin city. She lives with her husband in a humble house. Two years ago, Iman's husband opened a small store where he fixes antique items and resells them. It is a good business and earns a good income.
 
Iman took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help her husband to buy more items for his antique store, where he will fix them and resell them to local customers. By taking this loan, the sales will be increased for his store and the family income will also be increased.

Iman appears in the photo in her husband's store.

loans.use: to buy more items for her husband's antique store.

loans.name: Abdel Hameed

texts.en:
Abdel Hameed is a 48-year-old married man from Rafah city. He is the father of five sons.

For the past five years, Abdel has been working on his own farm where he raises chickens and sells their meat in the local market. It is a good business but somehow risky due to the losses from the weather and disease.

Abdel would like to improve his business, so he took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy heaters for his farm. This is very important to protect the chickens from the cold weather. By taking this loan, Abdel will be able to increase his productivity and also his income. Abdel appears in the photo on his farm.

loans.use: to buy heaters for his chicken farm

loans.name: Katkot Group

texts.en:
Katkot Group consists of four women who live in Hodeidah, Yemen. All of them are friends and from Hodeidah, Yemen. The entire group took a loan of 200,000 YER.

Jabra, 46, lives with her children in Hodeidah, Yemen. She sells incenses, perfumes, henna and other materials as her business. She is the only source of income to provide for her children.

Jabra has developed a good reputation in her community for her customer dealings and good quality services. She has applied for a loan of 60,000 YER from AMB for her business. With this loan, she will purchase cosmetics, incense, perfumes and other materials which will allow her to fulfill her client orders on time and earn higher profits. She and other members are grateful for Kiva lenders for funding their first loan.

loans.use: to buy more quantities of perfumes, incense, cloth, henna tubes, and other materials for her business

loans.name: Amjad

texts.en:
Amjad is 36 years old. He lives with his wife and his two children in Far'un village at Tulkarem. Far'un is a Palestinian town in the Tulkarm Governorate in the northeastern West Bank.

Amjad is asking Ryada for this loan to buy flagstones to pave his house and to install windows and doors, which will help him to take a step forward because he has a shortage of money to buy the things he needs. He is very grateful to everyone who helps him.

loans.use: to pave his house and install windows and doors

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more beauty products and makeup for her store

loans.name: Solano Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por tres mujeres luchadoras y trabajadoras una de ellas es Silvana tiene la edad de 44 años, casada, con tres hijos, se dedica al destace, elaboración y venta de nacatamales y tortillas desde hace 12 años, tiene de ser cliente de la institución 2 años lo cual en este tiempo ha demostrado ser una persona muy responsable en sus abonos. El crédito lo está solicitando para la compra de cerdo en pie, hojas, arroz, mecate, papa, achote, chiltoma, cebolla, tomate, maíz, cal, leña. Hortencia mujer de 28 años su negocio es la venta de tortillas y María de Jesús mujer de 44 años se dedica a la venta de ropa y bisutería.
texts.en:
This group consists of three hard working women. One of them is Silvana, who is 44 years old and is married with three children. She has made a living butchering, making and selling nacatamales [Nicaraguan style tamales] and tortillas for the past 12 years. She has been a client of this MFI for the past two years, during which she has shown herself to be very responsible in her loan payments. She is requesting this loan in order to buy live swine, leaves, rice, twine, potato, achiote, sweet pepper, onion, tomato, corn, lime powder and firewood.

The other members of the group are Hortencia, who is 28 years old and sells tortillas and Maria de Jesus, who is 44 years old and makes a living selling clothes and imitation jewelry.

loans.use: to buy live swine, leaves, rice, twine, potato, achiote, sweet pepper, onion, tomato, corn, lime and firewood.

loans.name: Cupido Group

texts.es: Este grupo lo forman tres socias luchadoras y trabajadoras  una de ellas es María tiene la edad 45 años, casada,con tres hijos, su negocio es la venta de pollo en su domicilio desde hace 10 años. Tiene de ser cliente de la institución 6 años. El crédito lo solicita para la compra de piezas de pollo como pechuga, muslos, piernas,ala, titil, conitos al por mayor. Raquel mujer de 29 años su negocio es la venta de cosméticos, Nubia mujer de 58 años su negocio es una pulpería.
texts.en:
This group consists of three hard working women. One of them is Maria, who is 45 years old and is married with three children. She has made a living selling chicken from her home for the past 10 years. She has been a client of this MFI for the past 6 years. She is requesting this loan in order to buy chickens parts such as breast, thigh, legs, wings gizzards and others wholesale.

The other members of the group are Raquel, who is 29 years old and sells cosmetics and Nubia, who is 58 years old and runs a grocery store.

loans.use: to buy chickens parts such as breast, thigh, legs, wings and others wholesale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for 19 colonies of bees and forage for feeding the livestock.

loans.name: Anushavan

texts.en:
Anushavan is an experienced farmer from Tegh village of Syuniq region. He lives with his wife and elderly pensioner mother. Anushavan's wife works in the private sector. Her salary, unfortunately, is very low, and cannot cover even the very basic needs of the family. Anushavan is extensively engaged in an agribusiness to be able to meet the daily expenses of his family. He breeds cattle, and cultivates wheat, and sells the agricultural products in the local market, which is an important source of income for the family. Anushavan's wife assists him greatly in his daily activities related to farming. 

To continue developing his agribusiness in a sustainable way, Anushavan needs a loan of USD 3,000 to purchase three cows, and to buy some forage for cattle. He and his family highly rely on the good will of the lenders and will greatly appreciate their support in collecting the needed amount to maintain and develop his agribusiness.

loans.use: to purchase three cows, and to buy some forage for cattle.

loans.name: El Buen Triunfo Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por tres socias emprendedoras exitosas una de ellas es Erlinda mujer de 65 años, casada, con dos hijos bajo su cargo, su negocio es una pulpería  ubicada en su domicilio desde hace 5 años. Tiene de ser clientes de la institución 3 años lo cual ha demostrado ser una persona muy responsable en sus cuotas. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de granos básicos como quintal de arroz, azúcar, aceite, papel higiénico, gaseosas, otros. Johana tiene 21 años su negocio es la venta de pan y Josefa mujer de 34 años su negocio es la venta de pan y nacatamales.
texts.en:
This group consists of three successful and entrepreneurial women. One of them is Erlinda, who is 65 years old and is married with two children under her care. She has made a living running a grocery store from her home for the past 5 years. She has been a client of this MFI for the past 3 years, during which she has shown herself to be very responsible in her loan payments. She is requesting this loan in order to buy basic supplies such as rice quintal, sugar, oil, toilet paper, fizzy drinks and other items.

The other members of the group are Johana, who is 21 years old and sells bread and Josefa, who is 34 years old and sells bread and nacatamales [Nicaraguan style tamales].

loans.use: to buy basic supplies such as rice quintal, sugar, oil, toilet paper, fizzy drinks and other items.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase lipstick, women's and men's perfume, face creams, body lotion, nail polish, and underwear.

loans.name: Los Jovenes Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por tres socios luchadores y trabajadores uno de ellos es Denis tiene la edad de 23 años, soltero, su negocio es un taller de mueblería  desde hace 4 años. El crédito lo está solicitando para la compra de madera, zener,tornillos, lijas, para la elaboracion de camas matrimoniales, unipersonales,comedores, sillas, jugueteras, esquineras. Huberne de 28 años se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras, Fabiola tiene la edad de 21 años su negocio es la venta de ropa y calzado.
texts.en:
This group consists of three hard working members. One of them is Denis, who is 23 years old and is single. He has made a living running a furniture workshop for the past 4 years. He is requesting this loan in order to buy wood, paint thinner, screws and files to make double and single beds, dining tables, chairs, home entertainment centers and corner cabinets.

The other members of the group are Huberne, who is 28 years old and makes a living selling fruit and vegetables and Fabiola, who is 21 years old and makes a living selling clothes and footwear.

loans.use: to buy wood, paint thinner, screws and files to make double and single beds, dining tables, chairs, home entertainment centers and corner cabinets.

loans.name: Las Bellas Group

texts.es: Este grupo lo forman tres socias productivas de negocio una de ellas es Mariana mujer de 49 años, casada, con un hijo bajo su cargo, su negocio es salón de belleza desde hace 30 años, el crédito lo requiere para la compra de tintes para el cabellos, shampoo profesional, acondicionador, agua oxigenada, otros. Ubenza  mujer de 54 años su negocio es la venta de ropa y cosméticos, Brenda tiene 45 años su negocio es un salón de belleza.
texts.en:
This group consists of three productive businesswomen. One of them is Mairana, who is 49 years old and is married with one son under her care. She has made a living running a beauty salon for the past 30 years. She is requesting a loan to buy hair dyes, professional shampoo, conditioner, hydrogen peroxide and other items.

The other members in the group are Ubenza, who is 54 years old and sells clothes and cosmetics and Brenda, who is 45 years old and runs a beauty salon.

loans.use: to buy hair dyes, professional shampoo, conditioner, hydrogen peroxide and other items.

loans.name: Agua Marina Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “AGUA MARINA” iniciará el décimo cuarto ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Collpani, está compuesta por nueve integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Verónica es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: trenzado de mantas, venta de espejo, tienda de abarrotes, ferretería, venta de verduras.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Verónica es integrante, ella indica que hace tres años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de su madre que es socia de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de espejos y ferretería; da a conocer que este negocio lo aprendió hace varios años de su padre y posteriormente lo convirtió en un negocio familiar.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de material de construcción y fierros) que adquirirá de las importadoras Bolivianas y posteriormente lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para mantener en lo posible a su hogar, ya que ella es soltera y tiene dos hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta las capacitaciones en el área de salud y crédito.
texts.en:
The Agua Marina community bank will start their fourteenth cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the Collpani regional center.  The group is made up of nine members and headed by an executive board, with Veronica as the President.  The businesses that the group members have are varied and include: braiding blankets, mirror sales, grocery stores, hardware stores, and vegetable sales.

The loan they are receiving will benefit small businesswomen like Veronica.  She has been a member of Pro Mujer for three years.  She was invited to join by her mother, who is also a member.  Currently she has a business selling mirrors and hardware.  She learned this business for many years from her father, and it later became a family business. 

She is requesting this loan to increase her capital and purchase construction materials and metals, which she will buy from Bolivian importers and later sell in her store.  This type of work allows her to generate income to support her household, since she is single and has two children.

When asked what she likes best about Pro Mujer, she responded that she likes the health trainings and the loans.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials and metals.

loans.name: Mujeres Soñadoras Group

texts.es: Irene es una de las cuatro mujeres emprendedoras de negocio que forman el grupo de mujeres soñadoras, tiene 37 años, casada, con tres hijos de 20, 14 y 4 años de edad, su negocio es la venta de ropa nueva desde hace año y medio. El crédito lo está solicitando para la compra de mercadería como es pantalones, blusas, camisas, shores, trajes de niños. Ana tiene 25 años su negocio es la venta de nacatamales, Anita de 30 años se dedica a la venta de ropa, Dominga tiene 57 años se dedica a la venta de nacatamales y sopa.
texts.en:
Irene is one of the four entrepreneurial women who make up the Mujeres Soñadoras group. She is 37 years old and is married with three children aged 20, 14 and 4. For a year and a half she has had a business selling new clothing.

Irene is asking for the loan to buy merchandise such as trousers, blouses, shirts, shorts and children's clothing.

Ana is 25 and has a business selling nacatamales; Anita is 30 and makes a living selling clothing and 57-year-old Dominga makes a living selling nacatamales and soup.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as trousers, blouses, shirts, shorts and children's clothing.

loans.name: Serzhik

texts.en:
Serzhik is a young farmer from Hovtun village of Shirak region. His family consists of his wife, parents and brother. His father and brother are currently labor migrants in Russia; they work there and send money to the family to take care of them. Serzhik's wife works in the village local library as a librarian. 

To be able to meet his family's needs, Serzhik is engaged in cattle breeding, in breeding sheep, in aviculture and in cultivation of wheat. His mother and wife help him greatly in his daily activities related to farming. The family sells the agricultural products in the local market, which is an important source of their income. 

As life is getting more expensive with time, Serzhik wants to expand his agribusiness a little bit so as to be able to effectively meet the family's needs. A loan of USD 2,000 will help him reach his goal, enabling him to purchase 13 sheep and to buy wheat and oat seeds. Serzhik and his family rely on the good will of the lenders and will appreciate their support in collecting the needed loan.

loans.use: to purchase 13 sheep and to buy wheat and oat seeds.

loans.name: Nazik

texts.en:
Nazik, a farmer from Goris city in the Syuniq region, lives with her husband and three school-age children (two daughters – 15 and 12 years old, and 9-year-old son). Nazik's husband works in the private sector in transportation service. He is the main breadwinner of the family. His salary, however, is not enough to meet the family's needs. 

To help her husband in earning a living for the family, Nazik is engaged in cattle breeding, sheep breeding, and beekeeping. With the help of her husband she sells her products in the local market,  the main source of family's income. 

To continue running her agribusiness in a sustainable way, Nazik needs to make some investments and so has requested a loan of USD 3000 to renovate the agricultural machinery and purchase 20 new beehives. Nazik and her family rely on the goodwill of the lenders and will highly appreciate their support in this matter.

loans.use: to purchase 20 new beehives

loans.name: Aram

texts.en:
Aram is from Jrapi village of Shirak region. He lives with his wife, two sons (4 and 2 years old) and his elderly pensioner mother. Aram receives a service pension. To take care of his family, Aram is extensively engaged in an agribusiness. With the help of his wife, he is involved in cattle breeding, in aviculture, in breeding sheep and in cultivation of wheat. He sells the agricultural products in the local market, which is the most important source of income for the family. 

Aram's agribusiness currently needs some investment in order for it to function in a sustainable and productive way. A loan of USD 3,000 will help this hard-working man and his family greatly, enabling him to purchase two cows and some forage for cattle and for the sheep. Aram and his family rely on the good-will of the lenders and will highly appreciate their support in collecting the needed loan amount.

loans.use: to purchase two cows, and some forage for cattle and for the sheep.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad is 32 years old; he lives in Gaza with his family.  He has two sons and one daughter. 

In 2010, Ahmad opened his own barbershop. Recently he hired an employee to help him because his customers continuously increase. He is very well known now. This is the main source for providing the family income.

He asked Ryada for this loan to buy a barber chair and materials for the shop such as shave gel, razors, shampoo, and other items. This will increase the number of clients and increase his income, which will help him to improve financial conditions for his family.  His dream is to expand his business, and he desires to use part of the profits on his children’s education.

loans.use: to buy a barber chair and materials for the shop such as shave gel, razors, shampoo, and other items

loans.name: Zoila Aracely

texts.es:
Zoila tiene 22 años de edad vive en Union Libre tiene 2 hijos vive con el copañero y sus hijos en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia los Ríos.

Es integrante de ventanilla V.R.C.  Virgen de Guadalupe que se encuentra ubicada en la Parroquia Puerto  Pechiche perteneciente al Cantón Pueblo Viejo esta ventanilla se dedica  a  labores agropecuarias.

Zoila se dedica a la siembra de maíz y arroz adeas se dedica a la ciranza de pollos.Solicita el crédito para la comprar de insumos fertilizantes, semillas y abonos ademas alimento para los animales.

Las compras lo realizan en el Cantón Ventanas Frecuentemente en agripag cada 15 dias.Su sueño es mejorar la producción de los cultivos.

El desafío que enfrenta la falta de un sistema de riego y las plagas y enfermedades en los cultivos.

En los tiempos libres le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Zoila is 22 years old, has two children, and lives in a common-law marriage. She lives with her partner and children in the canton of Ventanas in the province of Los Rios.  She is a member of the Virgen de Guadalupe community bank, which is located in the Puerto Pechiche parish in the canton of Pueblo Viejo.  This group is made up of people who work in farming and fishing.

Zoila works planting corn and rice as well as raising chickens.  She is requesting this loan to purchase supplies such as fertilizer, seeds, manure, and animal feed.  She will make her purchases every two weeks in the canton of Ventanas.  Her dream is to improve the production of her crops.

The challenges she faces include a lack of an irrigation system and crop diseases and sicknesses.  

In her free time, she likes to play sports.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer, seeds, manure, and animal feed.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy home appliances and furniture to use in his house.

loans.name: Rahmeh

texts.en:
Rahmeh is a 28-year-old divorced woman from Qalqilia city. She lives with her family in a small simple house in the city. For the past two years, Rahmeh has been working on her own farm where she raises chickens and sell their meat in the local market. It is a good business but somehow risky due to losses from the weather and disease. 

Rahmeh would like to improve her business and improve it. She took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help her to buy heaters for her farm. This is very important to protect the chickens from the cold weather. By taking this loan, Rahmeh will be able to increase her productivity and also her income. 

Rahmeh appears in the photo in her farm

loans.use: to buy heaters for her farm.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy car repair parts for his workshop

loans.name: Monte Oreb Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por tres socias luchadoras y trabajadoras Nohemi tiene la edad de 53 años, viuda, su negocio es la venta de tamuga en su domicilio desde hace 3 años, tiene a dos hijos  que dependen de ella. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de materia prima como es carne de res, tomate, chiltoma, cebolla, aceite, papa, zanahoria, hoja, mecate, leña, naranja dulce. Anielka mujer de 29 años su negocio es la venta de sopa de res, María mujer de 43 años su negocio es la venta de ropa.
texts.en:
This group consists of three hard working members. One of them is Nohemi, who is 53 years old and a widow. She has made a living selling tamuga [Nicaraguan snack] from her home for the past 3 years. She has two children who depend on her. She is requesting a loan to buy supplies such as beef, tomato, bell peppers, onion, oil, potato, carrot, leaves, twine, firewood and sweet oranges.

The other members in the group are Anielka, who is 29 years old and sells beef and Maria, who is 43 years old and makes a living selling clothes.

loans.use: to buy supplies such as beef, tomato, bell peppers, onion, oil, potato, carrot, leaves, twine, firewood and sweet oranges.

loans.name: La Fernanda Group

texts.es: Este grupo lo forman tres  socias trabajadoras una de ellas es María Xiomara tiene la edad de 23 años, acompañada, su negocio es la compra y venta de frutas desde hace 5 años. El crédito lo solicita para la compra de naranja, mandarina, granadilla. Eveling tiene 27 años de edad su negocio es un salón de belleza, Maria teresa mujer de 44 años de edad se dedica a la venta de ropa.
texts.en:
This group consists of three hard working members. One of them is Maria Xiomara, who is 23 years old and lives with her partner. She has made a living buying and selling fruit for the past 5 years. She is requesting a loan to buy oranges, mandarins, and passionflowers.

The other members in the group are Eveling, who is 27 years old and works in a beauty salon and Maria Teresa, who is 44 years old and makes a living selling clothes.

loans.use: to buy oranges, mandarins, and passionflowers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase zinc tiles, beams, and hire laborers.

loans.name: El Mango Group

texts.es: Carelia es una de las tres integrantes del grupo el mango tiene la edad de 30 años, acompañada, con dos hijos, su negocio es la venta de tortillas y plátanos en el mercado de Masaya  desde hace 3 años, tiene de ser cliente de la institución 1 año y medio. El crédito lo solicita para la compra de maíz. Cal, leña, plátanos al por mayor. María mujer de 44 años su negocio es la venta de pan, Jorge tiene 38 años su negocio es la compra y venta de frutas.
texts.en:
Carelia is one of the three members of the group "El Mango". She is 30 years old and lives with her partner and two children. She has made a living selling tortillas and bananas in the market of Masaya for the past 3 years. She has been a client with this MFI for a year and a half. She is requesting a loan to buy corn. lime powder, firewood, and bananas wholesale.

The other members in the group are Maria, who is 44 years old and sells bread and Jorge, who is 38 years old and makes a living buying and selling fruit.

loans.use: to buy corn. lime powder, firewood, and bananas wholesale.

loans.name: Santa Fe Group

texts.es: Grupo Formado por tres integrantes luchadores uno de ellos es Ana tiene la edad de 34 años, acompañada, con dos hijos su negocio es una pulpería ubicada en su domicilio desde hace 9 años. Tiene de ser cliente de la institución 3 año. El crédito lo solicita para la compra de quintales de frijoles, arroz, azúcar, huevo, crema perfecta, Frijoles, otros. José tiene la edad de 41 años su negocio es la venta de frutas y pan, Evelin tiene 35 años su negocio es la venta de leche.
texts.en:
This group consists of three hard working members. One of them is Ana, who is 34 years old and lives with her partner and two children. She has run a grocery store in her home for the past 9 years. She has been a client with this MFI for 3 years. She is requesting a loan to buy quintals of beans, rice, sugar, eggs, cream and other items.

The other members in the group are José, who is 41 years old and sells bread and fruit and Evelin, who is 35 years old and makes a living selling milk.

loans.use: to buy quintals of beans, rice, sugar, eggs, cream and other items.

loans.name: Hana'

texts.en:
Hana’ is 25 years old. She lives with her husband in Gaza. They have two children; she works at a salon for women as an employee, and her dream is to open her own salon. 

She  applied for this loan from Ryada  to paint her house and expand it by building another two rooms because the house is small. This  will help to improve her house and give good living conditions. She is very grateful to everyone who helps her.

loans.use: to paint her house and expand it by building another two rooms

loans.name: Edgar

texts.en:
Edgar lives in Malishka village. He is not married and lives with his parents. Edgar has been involved in beekeeping for 18 years and is already a skilled farmer. Currently he keeps 10 colonies of bees, chickens and a cow. The gathered honey and other agricultural products are sold in the local open markets and so Edgar is able to gather income for his family.  

Now, in order to enlarge his farm, Edgar is asking for this loan of USD 3,000. The loan will greatly assist him to increase the number of colonies of bees by 11, to purchase an ox and also forage to feed the livestock during the winter season. Edgar will be very thankful to lenders as the loan will be a huge support for his farming business.

loans.use: to pay for 11 colonies of bees, an ox and forage to feed the livestock during the winter season.

loans.name: Marine

texts.en:
Marine is an experienced agronomist from Lusaghbyur village of Lori region. She lives wtih her husband, three school-age children (two sons, 16 and 13 years old and a 10-year-old daughter) and her mother-in-law. To take care of the family's needs, Marine, with the help of her husband, is engaged in cattle breeding, breeding pigs and sheep and in cultivation of wheat, potatoes and grass. They sell the agricultural products in the local market, and this is the main source of the family's income. 

To continue running her agribusiness in a sustainable way and to develop it further, Marine needs a loan of USD 3,000 to purchase wheat seeds, to buy some forage for the livestock and to make previous credit repayments. Marine and her family highly rely on the good-will of the lenders and will appreciate their support in collecting the needed loan to maintain and develop their agribusiness.

loans.use: to purchase wheat seeds, to buy some forage for the livestock and to make previous credit repayments.

loans.name: Karen

texts.en:
Karen is from Arpy village of Vayots Dzor region. He is a young agronomist with two years of experience in that field. Specifically, Karen keeps a few livestock: two cows and 14 chickens. The gathered milk and meat is sold in the local open market and Karen is able to gather income for his family. 

He lives with his parents and does his best to sustain them. Now Karen is asking for a loan of USD 1,500 to be able to purchase a cow and forage to feed the livestock. He hopes that Kiva lenders will help him to develop his agricultural activities.

loans.use: to purchase a cow and forage to feed the livestock.

loans.name: Seryozha

texts.en:
Seryozha is from Gogaran village of Lori region. He is an agronomist with 25 years of experience in that field. Seryozha runs a farm with great love and care. It currently includes livestock: cows, sheep, pigs and chickens as well as a private plot of land where wheat, barley and grass are cultivated. Seryozha sells the gathered products to the local re-sellers and is able to gather income for his family.

As agriculture is the only stable source of income for the family, Seryozha would like to enlarge it. He has applied for this loan to purchase two sheep and forage to feed the livestock during the winter season. The loan of USD 3,000 will be a huge support to this hard-working farmer, with a a great credit history behind him, to enlarge his farm. Seryozha will be very thankful to the lenders for their support.

loans.use: to pay for two sheep and forage for feeding the livestock.

loans.name: Alina

texts.en:
Alina sells clothing in a rented store in Yerevan town. She has been engaged in this activity for already six years and due to her hard work, is able to gather enough income. Alina is 56 years old and she has three daughters who are married and live separately with their families. 

Alina lives alone and her only income comes from her retail business. So now, Alina is asking for a loan of USD 3,000 to be able to purchase a new stock of clothing to resell to her clients.

Alina is very enthusiastic about the loan and she hopes that it will assist her to meet current market demand and gather more income.

loans.use: to pay for a new stock of clothing to resell to the clients.

loans.name: Armen

texts.en:
Armen is from Bagravan village of Shirak region. He lives there with his wife, retired father and 13-year-old son. His elder son is currently serving in the army. Armen is an experienced agronomist. Together with his wife, he keeps 15 colonies of bees. Near the village, Armen also owns a plot of land where wheat and barley are cultivated. With the help of his wife, Armen gathers high quality honey and sells it in the local markets. Agriculture is the only source of income for the family, and that's the reason Armen would like to enlarge it. 

He is asking for a loan of USD 3,000 to be able to purchase two cows and forage for feeding them in the winter. The loan is important for him to enable him to enlarge the agricultural business that he has been involved in for many years and make his farm more profitable.

loans.use: to pay for two cows and forage to feed the livestcok.

loans.name: Hasmik

texts.en:
Hasmik is from Yerevan. She lives with her son and daughter-in-law. For five years already, Hasmik has been selling clothing from a rented store in one of the trade centers. Hasmik tries hard to sustain her family's living standards. As a result, she currently has a lot of customers who prefer to purchase clothing only from her. 

Currently Hasmik is asking for a loan of USD 3,000 to be able to purchase a new stock of clothing to resell to her customers. Hasmik expects high demand for clothing during the coming holidays and she will be very grateful to the lenders for their support.

loans.use: to pay for new stock of clothing to resell to customers.

loans.name: Dionee Nohelia

texts.es:
Nohelia continúa con la venta materiales de construcción como por ejemplo arena, cemento, etc. Ya son varios años que se dedica a  este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Mamacha Carmen” y esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales de construcción como arena, yeso, cemento y piedras para incrementar el capital del negocio. Agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad. (En la fotografía la socia está acompañada de su esposo).

Nohelia vive junto con su familia en la hermosa ciudad de Paucartambo en el departamento del Cusco, ella tiene 31 años de edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos a quienes saca adelante.
texts.en:
Nohelia still sells construction materials such as sand, cement, etc.  She has been in this business for several years now and it's going very well for her thanks to the effort she puts into her work.

She belongs to Mamacha Carmen Communal Bank and needs this loan to buy construction supplies such as sand, plaster, cement, and stones to increase her business capital.  She's grateful for and appreciates the loan and promises to make her monthly payments responsibly.

Nohelia lives with her family in the beautiful city of Paucartambo in the department of Cusco.  She's 31 years old and in a common-law marriage from which she has two children, whom she gets ahead.   (Her husband is with her in the the photograph.)

loans.use: to buy construction supplies like sand, plaster, cement, and stones.

loans.name: Thomas

texts.en:
Thomas lives in Sindo, a small town in Homa Bay county. Homa Bay county is located in south-western Kenya, and borders on Lake Victoria, the second-largest lake in the world. The population is dense close to the lake, where many individuals make their living from fishing, and a few work in the small but slowly growing tourism industry. A popular tourist attraction in Homa Bay county is Ruma National Park, a game reserve that is home to the rare roan antelope, a shy species distantly related to the reticulated giraffe. Most people in Homa Bay make their living from farming, and the rolling hills of the area are dotted with fields and fruit tree plantations.

Thomas is married and has six children. Both he and his wife are farmers. They have been farming for thirty years now, and are currently growing cassava, maize, beans and sweet potatoes. Thomas is excited about beekeeping because it will generate more income for him.

This is Thomas’ first loan with Honey Care. He intends to use the proceeds from his beehives to pay school fees for his children. 

Thomas’ hope for the future is to add more livestock to plow his farm.

loans.use: to buy beehives and apiary materials for honey production.

loans.name: Olinda Marisol

texts.es:
Olinda tiene 21 años de edad  estado civil soltera, vive con sus padres y su hija en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.

Es integrante de la VRC SAN FRANCISCO, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Pantano, pertenece al Cantón Ventanas se dedican a labores Agrícolas y Pecuarias.

Olinda se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra maiz. Solicita el crédito para comprar semillas, urea, fertilizantes, insecticidas. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar lo necesario para la agricultura. 
Las compras las realizará en Ventanas en el comercial Briones. El sueño es tener su propia casa . Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta son las enfermedades. En el tiempo libre le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Olinda is 21 years old, single, and lives with her parents and daughter in the Ventanas canton in the province of Los Rios.  She is a member of the San Francisco community bank, which is located in the town of Pantano in the canton of Ventanas.  It is made up of people who work in farming and fishing.

Olinda works as a farmer planting corn.  She is requesting this loan to purchase seeds, urea, fertilizers, and insecticides.  With the help of the loan, she will be able to purchase all the necessary items for her crops.  She will make the purchases in Ventanas at the store Briones.  

Her dream is to own a home.  She faces challenges such as diseases.  In her free time, she likes to play sports.

loans.use: to purchase supplies and fertilizer for her corn crop.

loans.name: 3.05.612.10.thiệu Trung Group

texts.en:
Long is 59 years old and married with three adult children. She lives and works in Thieu Hoa district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province. Long is a farmer who raises poultry and cattle. She is the group leader of the 3.05.612.10.Thiệu Trung solidarity group, which consists of three members. Long joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor women in 2003 to improve her business and she has successfully repaid two previous loans. Her main business hardship is her lack of capital.

Long is requesting a loan to purchase baby cattle to raise and sell in future. She plans to use the profit from her loan to build a new house, maintain her successful business, and buy more supplies and equipment.

loans.use: to purchase baby livestock to raise and sell in future.

loans.name: 3.05.609.8.thiệu Trung Group

texts.en:
Chính is 53 years old and married with three adult children. She lives in Thieu Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.  Chính operates a food stall where she sells fruit. She is the leader of the 3.05.609.8.Thiệu Trung solidarity group, which consists of five members. Chính joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women in 2011 to improve her business and she has successfully repaid two previous loans. Her main business hardship is the lack of capital.

Chính is requesting a loan to purchase fruit to sell. She plans to use the profit from her loan to maintain a successful business and buy more supplies and equipment.

loans.use: to purchase fruit to sell

loans.name: 06.02.03 Đông Vệ Group

texts.en:
Liên is 39 years old and she is married with one child. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, a urban area in Thanh Hoa province, with one dependent.

She has a retail business selling incense and ghost money. She  has been involved in this business for five years. The main hardship that Liên faces in her business is the lack of capital. She is requesting a loan to purchase incense and ghost money to resell.

In 2010, Liên joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. She has successfully repaid four loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. She is the group leader of the 06.02.03 Đông Vệ solidarity group, which consists of four members. 

With her business profit, Liên hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her children to do well in school, and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase incense and ghost money to resell.

loans.name: Proyecto Group

texts.es: El grupo lo conforman tres socias emprendedoras una de ellas es Margina mujer de 43 años de edad, acompañada, con un hijo bajo su cargo de 14 años, su negocio es comerciante de carne desde hace 12 años, su compañero y ella  atienden el negocio. El crédito lo solicita para la compra de carne de res al por mayor.Deyanira tiene 27 años su negocio es la venta de ropa y María se dedica a la venta de comida.
texts.en:
This group is made up of three entrepreneurial women. One of them is Margina who is 43 years old and has a partner and a dependent 14-year-old son. For 12 years she has had a business selling meat and runs the business with her partner. 

Margina is asking for the loan to buy beef wholesale.

Deyanira is 27 years old and has a business selling clothing and María makes a living selling food.

loans.use: to buy beef wholesale.

loans.name: 3.19.615.02.quán Lào Group

texts.en:
